text: @realDonaldTrump You lying piece of junk! The World is so tired of this rotten cabbage. You whine about ratings, Obamagate & facemasks while America is winning the Worldcup on #Coronavirus #Covid19 deaths! Oh Trump, U overgrown child! 100000 deaths? Just think 4 once!
